Cons:

3. You need to use the desktop to app to do some other things with transactions
4. "Goals" feature requires you save money in a checking/savings account for a single goal.
5. Budgeting is simplistic. Only tracks spend. Can't allocate money towards a budget ahead of time like with YNAB.
